content: this granny stitch planned pooling pattern is written by rocky of rockinlola and is featured on marly bird s blog please follow the link to marly s blog to access the pattern http //www marlybird com/granny-stitch-planned-pooling-crochet/ this granny stitch planned pooling pattern will guide you on how to use the granny stitch / granny stripe with the crochet planned pooling technique it is written in american us crochet terms planned pooling is all about adjusting your gauge to make the colors pool into a specific pattern while the pattern here suggests a certain hook size and number of clusters these may vary from person to person in order to get similar patterns to the featured photos use self striping yarns with a regular repeating pattern red heart yarns that work well with this method include red heart super saver neon stripes red heart super saver primary stripes
